Package com.fdmgroup.spring.timothy_chai_ecommerce_project.service

Class CartService

java.lang.Object
com.fdmgroup.spring.timothy_chai_ecommerce_project.service.CartService
@Service public class CartService extends Object
This class provides services for managing a customer's shopping cart.
Author:
- timothy.chai

  • Method Details

    • findCartItemInCart

      public Optional<CartItem> findCartItemInCart(Cart cart, Product product)
      Finds a CartItem in the specified cart that matches the specified Product.
      Parameters:
      cart - the cart to search
      product - the product to match
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the matching CartItem, or an empty Optional if no match is found

    • updateCart

      public void updateCart(Cart cart)
      Updates the specified cart in the database.
      Parameters:
      cart - the cart to update

    • addToCart

      public void addToCart(Customer customer, Product product, int quantity)
      Adds the specified product to the specified customer's cart.
      Parameters:
      customer - the customer adding the product to their cart
      product - the product being added to the cart
      quantity - the quantity of the product being added to the cart

    • removeFromCart

      public void removeFromCart(Customer customer, Product product, int quantity)
      Removes the specified product from the specified customer's cart.
      Parameters:
      customer - the customer removing the product from their cart
      product - the product being removed from the cart
      quantity - the quantity of the product being removed from the cart

    • clearCart

      public void clearCart(Cart cart)
      Checks out the specified cart.
      Parameters:
